name: You're a Spy
description:
Make in one week for the incremental game jam 2020.

This is am incremental game about sabotaging an incremental game played by the AI. You complete missions as you gain skill and eventually topple the company by reducing its net worth to 0. Then you look at the achievements and try to reach the other 5-7 endings. 

Some buttons can be held down to auto-click.

Thanks for playing!
